attributes.action: Stop fireworks on Thursday ‘Clap for carers’
attributes.additional_details: In the time of this crisis I feel nobody is listening to the little people whose lives are affected the most. My neighbours cat was fleeing though my garden from the fireworks. My little girl had just settled to sleep but woke up in tears. If this was a normal day it would be illegal but because of the crisis it is okay?
attributes.background: We all appreciate the work the NHS and the rest of the keyworkers do through this crisis however a clap and a bang of a pan is sufficient. The use of fireworks every week is scaring pets, waking young children and babies and waking keyworkers who are working long shifts.
